title: Welcome Visitors

story.text: Welcome, this is the personal federated wiki of [[Nick Niemeir]], and is currently mostly used to test the express server for [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]. Slowly it will be used more and more for off site storage for my brain, and may eventually develop content interesting to other people, but on that we will have to see...
I have been musing about [[JavaScript]] here. Also, even though it's almost over, i've started a [[Journal for 2014]]
If this if your first time here be sure to check out [[How to Wiki]].  Feel free to double click, drag, and edit anything, changes will be saved back to your own local storage, not my server.

item.text: Welcome to the [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]. This page was first drafted Sunday, June 26th, 2011, at [[Indie Web Camp]]. You are welcome to copy this page to any server you own and revise its welcoming message as you see fit. You can assume this has happened many times already. See also [[

Welcome to the [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]. This page was first drafted Sunday, June 26th, 2011, at [[Indie Web Camp]]. You are welcome to copy this page to any server you own and revise its welcoming message as you see fit. You can assume this has happened many times already, most likely among the [[List of Pioneers]].

This page was first drafted Sunday, June 26th, 2011, at [[Indie Web Camp]]. You are welcome to copy this page to any server you own and revise its welcoming message as you see fit. You can assume this has happened many times already.
Welcome to the [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]. You may be seeing this page because you have just entered a wiki of your own. If so, you have three things to do before you go on.

One: Create a page about yourself. Start by making a link to that page right here. Double-click the gray box below. That opens an editor. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/CTRL-S to save.

Two: Create a page about things you do on this wiki. Double-click the gray box below. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing aout. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/CTRL-S to save.

Three: Look for the claim button below this page. If you have your own OpenID you can use it to claim these pages so that only you can edit them. If you have a Google account you can use that too. Press the (G) button. Press the (Y) button to use your Yahoo account. You get the idea.
Start writing. Click either link. Press [+] to add more writing spaces.
Start writing. Click either link. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas.

Welcome, this is the personal federated wiki of [[Nick Niemeir]], and is currently mostly used to test the express server for [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]. Slowly it will be used more and more for off site storage for my brain, and may eventually develop content interesting to other people, but on that we will have to see...
If this if your first time here be sure to check out [[How to Wiki]].  Feel free to double click, drag, and edit anything, changes will be saved back to your own local storage, not my server.
